content.prompt: The Flavian Amphitheater became commonly known as the Colosseum because of the

choices.label: massive hill that was excavated to prepare the site
huge crowds that could be accommodated within the structure
monumental statue of an emperor that stood nearby
important name of the wealthy family that financed its construction

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
